frameset.edef: to object or be opposed to

role.argrole: objected to - usually mared by على

example.parse: (TOP (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS قال) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP عنان)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_ACC بغداد)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS اعترضت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_DU_GEN_POSS منطقتي) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حظر) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الطيران)))))))))) (PUNC .)))
